mapper.select: SELECT RPT_CD, MEM_NNM, RSN, DT, ST FROM ( SELECT PR.PL_RPT_CD AS RPT_CD, MD.MEM_NNM AS MEM_NNM, RR.RPT_RSN AS RSN, PR.PL_RPT_DT AS DT, RS.RPT_ST_CONT AS ST FROM PLAN_REPORT PR LEFT JOIN REPORT_STATUS RS ON PR.RPT_ST_CD = RS.RPT_ST_CD LEFT JOIN REPORT_REASON RR ON PR.RPT_RSN_CD = RR.RPT_RSN_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER_DATA MD ON PR.MEM_CD = MD.MEM_CD ) UNION ALL ( SELECT TR.TR_RPT_CD AS RPT_CD, MD.MEM_NNM AS MEM_NNM, RR.RPT_RSN AS RSN, TR.TR_RPT_DT AS DT, RS.RPT_ST_CONT AS ST FROM TRIP_REPORT TR LEFT JOIN REPORT_STATUS RS ON TR.RPT_ST_CD = RS.RPT_ST_CD LEFT JOIN REPORT_REASON RR ON TR.RPT_RSN_CD = RR.RPT_RSN_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER_DATA MD ON TR.MEM_CD = MD.MEM_CD ) UNION ALL ( SELECT HR.PPR_CD AS RPT_CD, MD.MEM_NNM AS MEM_NNM, RR.RPT_RSN AS RSN, HR.PPR_DT AS DT, RS.RPT_ST_CONT AS ST FROM PHOTO_POST_REPORT HR LEFT JOIN REPORT_STATUS RS ON HR.RPT_ST_CD = RS.RPT_ST_CD LEFT JOIN REPORT_REASON RR ON HR.RPT_RSN_CD = RR.RPT_RSN_CD LEFT JOIN MEMBER_DATA MD ON HR.MEM_CD = MD.MEM_CD ) ORDER BY DT DESC

SELECT SUM(A.COUNT + B.COUNT + C.COUNT) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PLAN_REPORT ) A , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TRIP_REPORT ) B , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PHOTO_POST_REPORT ) C

SELECT SUM(A.COUNT + B.COUNT + C.COUNT) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PLAN_REPORT WHERE TO_CHAR(PL_RPT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) A , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TRIP_REPORT WHERE TO_CHAR(TR_RPT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) B , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PHOTO_POST_REPORT WHERE TO_CHAR(PPR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) C
